content: repeat from * around work rnds 1 4 of cable pattern from chart or written instructions 5 times begin crown decreases round 1 decrease *k2tog k4 repeat from * around 65 sts round 2 *p1 k4 repeat from * around round 3 *k1 c2/2l repeat from * around round 4 *p1 k4 repeat from * around round 5 decrease *k2tog k3 repeat from * around 52 sts round 6 *c2/2l repeat from * around round 7 remove m *k4 repeat from * to 1 st rem replace m round 8 decrease *k2tog k2 repeat from * to 2 sts rem replace m k2tog 39 sts round 9 k all sts round 10 decrease *sl 2 sts to cn hold front sl next st from lh ndl to rh ndl sl 2 sts from cn back to lh ndl slip_stitch from rh ndl to lh ndl k2tog k1 repeat from * around 26 sts round 11 k all sts round 12 decrease *ssk repeat from * around 13 sts round 13 decrease k1 *ssk repeat from * around 7 sts finishing break yarn leaving an 8 20 cm tail thread through live sts and fasten_off soak in cool water and wool wash and block to measurements pom pom make a 3 7 5 cm diameter pompom secure pom pom to hat and tie off inside year of hats 12 more designs from label kelbourne woolens using sewing thread or yarn provided in kit and a sharp sewing needle sew kelbourne woolens label to brim as shown ©2022 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 3 share with us follow us on instagram @kelbournewoolens and show us your projects using the hashtags #kelbournewoolens #yearofbulkyhats ©2022 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved images © linette kielinski v 2 8 5 22 not to be reproduced or re-knit for sale or profit 4
